headline: Coinbase Hires Former Goldman Sachs Partner To Manage Key Pillars Of 'Everything Exchange' Strategy
summary: Coinbase (NASDAQ:COIN) has hired former Goldman Sachs (NYSE:GS) Partner Liz Martin as it looks to expand beyond cryptocurrency trading. Martin is joining Coinbase as vice president of product, overseeing its markets and derivatives divisions, the exchange said in a statement to Benzinga on Thursday. “She will lead Coinbase’s exchanges, drive the next phase of growth for the company’s derivatives business, and manage its global markets team – all key pillars of Coinbase’s ‘Everything Exchange’ st

headline: Coinbase UK CEO Says Crypto Downturn Reflects Macro Jitters, Not Lost Confidence
summary: Crypto markets extended their decline this week, with Bitcoin slipping to multi-week lows and shedding hundreds of billions of dollars in market value. Yet according to Coinbase UK CEO Keith Grose, the downturn reflects a broader shift in global risk sentiment rather than fading conviction in digital assets.Grose said Coinbase’s ...

headline: Coinbase Working on Prediction Markets Website, Tech Researcher says
summary: A tech researcher named Jane Manchun Wong has hinted at the possibility that American cryptocurrency exchange Coinbase is working on a prediction markets website. She shared some screenshots on X to back up this claim. The images also showed that the project will be backed by the prediction market company ...

headline: Voting on Crypto Market Bill by US Senate to Happen Next Month
summary: Tim Scott, the US Senate Banking Committee chair, said the committee will soon vote on the crypto market structure bill to bring clearer regulations to the industry. Since the bill covers both securities and commodities, it must pass through the Senate Banking Committee as well as the Senate Agriculture Committee. ...

headline: Crypto Becomes Infrastructure — A Conversation with Arthur Firstov, CBO of Mercuryo
summary: Mercuryo’s Arthur Firstov explains how stablecoins, tokenized assets, and new payment rails push crypto into mainstream financial use.

headline: Coinbase Building Prediction Markets Platform Backed by Kalshi, Leaked Screenshots Show
summary: Coinbase appears to be preparing its own prediction markets platform, according to leaked screenshots shared on Tuesday by tech researcher Jane Manchun Wong. Key Takeaways: Leaked screenshots show Coinbase developing a prediction markets platform built on Kalshi’s regulated infrastructure. The interface appears to support USDC or USD trading across categories ...

headline: Coinbase (COIN): Evaluating Valuation as Crypto Market Downturn Sparks Renewed Focus
summary: Coinbase Global (COIN) shares are drawing renewed attention after a swift decline in Bitcoin and Ethereum sent crypto-linked stocks lower. This close connection to digital asset prices means investors are watching market moves closely. See our latest analysis for Coinbase Global. It’s been a turbulent stretch for Coinbase Global as fresh headlines about a scrapped $2 billion acquisition and new UK product launches arrived just as crypto markets endured another sharp selloff. headline: How Recent Moves and Analyst Debates Are Shaping the Story for Coinbase
summary: Coinbase Global's fair value estimate has nudged higher, with the consensus analyst price target rising from $382.56 to $385.27 per share. This slight increase comes as new analyst commentary reflects a mix of optimism and caution about the company's latest results and evolving strategy. Stay tuned to discover how market insights and ongoing analyst debates may continue to shape Coinbase's stock narrative moving forward. Stay updated as the Fair Value for Coinbase Global shifts by adding it...
